events.title: SF Board of Supervisors: AI Business Regulations
events.summary: The Board is considering new disclosure requirements for AI companies operating in San Francisco, including algorithmic transparency and bias auditing mandates.

events.title: Housing Element Implementation Hearing
events.summary: Planning Commission hearing on streamlining ADU permits and increasing housing density near transit corridors in the Mission and SoMa districts.
events.location: SF Planning Dept, 49 South Van Ness

events.title: Downtown Congestion Pricing Vote
events.summary: SFMTA Board will vote on implementing congestion pricing for downtown SF. Proposed $5-12 fee during peak hours to reduce traffic and fund transit.

events.title: Small Business Tax Relief Extension
events.summary: Proposal to extend pandemic-era tax relief for small businesses and startups with under $2M revenue. Affects gross receipts tax and registration fees.

events.title: Affordable Housing Linkage Fee Increase
events.summary: Proposed 15% increase in developer fees for office space to fund affordable housing. Tech companies building new offices would pay higher impact fees.

events.title: Police Commission: SoMa Safety Plan
events.summary: Community input session on increased foot patrols and safety cameras in the SoMa tech corridor. Focus on property crime near startups and transit.

events.title: Muni Service Restructuring Proposal
events.summary: SFMTA considering route changes affecting downtown and Mission. The 14-Mission may see reduced frequency. Public comment period open.

events.title: Startup Visa Support Resolution
events.summary: Resolution urging federal support for startup visa program to retain international founders. SF tech leaders invited to testify.

match_explanation: Showing events matching your interests in technology, housing, and civic engagement in San Francisco.
